Obstructive Apnea per hour (REM, Other, all oxygen desaturations). events per hour
RDI at all oxygen desaturations [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas) / (hours of sleep)]
Central Apnea Index at all oxygen desaturations [(Total number of central apneas associated with all oxygen desaturations) / (hours of sleep)]

Obstructive Apnea Hypopnea Index at 4% oxygen desaturation. Ratio of the count of all obstructive apneas plus the count of hypopneas associated with at least a 4% oxygen desaturation to the total sleep time expressed in hours. {[(Total number of obstructive apneas) + (Total number of hypopneas associated with >= 4% oxygen desaturation)] / (hours of sleep)}
Percent of sleep time with oxygen saturation < 90%. Ratio of the number of minutes with oxygen saturation under 90% to the total sleep time expressed in hours.
